name: Semi-Advance Summons (Skill Card)
text:
Generic / Skill
At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.
Both players can Normal Summon/Set Level 5 or Level 6 monsters with 2000 or less ATK and DEF without Tribute(s), unless that monster can already be Normal Summoned without Tribute(s). If the monster being Summoned/Set using this Skill is an Effect monster, the controller of that monster must pay 1200 LP.
